lines.text: Use unnecessary force, if necessary!
Alec?
Did you talk to Big Wally?
Yeah, yeah. I told him you got away on me. He was very... unhappy.
Trust me. It's the BRIGHTEST move you ever made.
Yeah, well, meanwhile, my reputation as an enforcer has been permanently... soiled.
But when we win, you just say you caught up with me and I gave you the 50 grand, then we SPLIT the other 50 grand and everyones happy.
I get 35, YOU get 15.
Isn't that what I said?
You just said we'd split it.
But I didn't say we'd split it EVENLY. YOU get 15, and I get 35.
Right.
And if we don't win?
Then you kill me.
[Long silence, then both enter the Jag]
Tiffany, sweetie. You remember Charlie, our driver?
Hello again, Mr. Cronin.

[raspy voiced]
Hello! Hello, hello?
Charlie, you remember Tiffany, don't you?

[raspy voiced]
Yes! Yes. Oatmeal, I forgot to add the water.
So, Vic. What do you think of my idea of writing down the license numbers now?
Yeah, yeah, yeah! It's a great idea! How many times you gotta bring it up?
[on phone]
R-I-C-H... Uh, I think that spells "Rich"... Kids... with a "k"... for "kids".
What's this? A Volvo? A Volvo! Pass it! Pass it, pass it!
[winds down window]
Why don't you go back to Sweden, ya bunch of yodellers!
[Margaret's Fuzzbuster goes off]
That's strange. That only happens when there's cops around. Say, sugar, whatcha got under there?
[Gus takes off his towel]
Nothing.
You're right about that.
Move over.
Huh?
Move *over*!
[Valentino climbs into the passenger seat]
Please, mister, it's not my fault. My brother Donato, he make me do this. Please, sir! Don't put me in jail with the Manson family!
[Flash climbs into the car]
Get your seatbelt on and put your hands on the dashboard. Come on! We've got some catching up to do.
Look, what would Big Wally rather have? Me dead or his fifty grand?
Both.
You really want to win this thing, don't you?
Oh, absolutely. I mean winning the Cannonball. That's something you tell your grandkids about.
You're a grandfather? You look so young.
Oh no, I'm not a grandfather yet. I hope to have grandkids someday, but I'm not a grandfather yet.
Oh, I see what you mean. It's nice to have things in your life that are important. But to do the things you want to do, you have to do things you don't want to do.
Uh, what do you think you're doing? What, are you crazy?
Relax. I've got a brilliant idea.
Yeah, well, so far I don't like it.
So far, you haven't even heard it.
Alright, what is it?
I'll tell you once we get to the airport.
Airport? What airport?
The Dulles Airport.
Are we going to Fresno?
Fresno? Who said anything about Fresno? Did I say anything about Fresno?
Well, you said the dullest airport and the dullest airport I know of is in Fresno.
I didn't say dullEST! I said Dulles! Dulles! Read my lips!
I wonder if they're gonna feed us on this flight.
I... do not speak English... too good.
Francois?
Oui, oui. Francais.
Je ne parla... uh, je ne par... je ne parl... no speaka French.
You would like my penis?
Hmmm?
You would like my penis?
Uh, I'm on my way to L.A. to meet with my wife and two kids... uh, three kids. We're gonna have a nice little family reunion.
You would like my penis?
Look, I don't have a problem with it. It's just not my thing, alright?

[holding a bag of peanuts]
You wouldn't like?
Peanuts! Peanuts! Oh, thank you. Sorry, I thought you were talking about something else.
That tells you where movie stars live! Is that the best one they had?
It's alright. I find Santa Monica Pier.
So, how do we get there?

[checking the map]
Ah! Ah! Turn right here at Sly Stallone's house. Then it's a left at Lucy Ball's.

[looking at the house]
That's Stallone's house?
[the Ferrari stops at a red light]
Okay, baby, let's go to work.
How about we start with a few green lights?
[Margaret uses her computer to turn the lights green and the Ferrari takes off. The other Cannonballers approach the intersection]
Time to separate the men from the girls!
[Margaret uses her computer to turn the lights back to red]
[the beam from a signal mirror repeatedly flashes in Edsel's face]
Whoever it is with that signal mirror, I want his badge number! I'll personally crack that signal mirror over his head!
[Vic looks over the roadblock with binoculars]
Get in the car, Alec.
What?
Get in the car, Alec! I'm gonna drive!
Vic, you turn that frown upside-down right now!
[Vic grabs Alec by the collar]
I'll turn YOU upside-down right now!
[Alec races towards the finish in the police car]
Four to one, Vic! The Jag wins!
Yeah, but we're not in the Jag.
It doesn't matter, Vic! The Jag wins, we win!

[singing]
But more, much more than this, I did it my way!
[Alec hides in the bathroom after the race is cancelled]
Open it, Alec! There ain't no race, so I gotta kill you!
I can't let you do it, Vic! You'll hate yourself in the morning!
[Jack has just run a police roadblock]
Jack, what are you doing?
There's something screwy here. I just know it.
Oh, right. A cop is going to stand in the middle of Armpit, Kansas just to lie to you.

[to a pair of surfers]
Oh, Todd!
You know him?
No, but one them's always named Todd.
